Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:68 yr old white male retired presents with moderate hearing loss, moderate rotational vertigo, Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat. he has history of moderate dizziness. Patient does not smoke Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 188 cm, Weight 71.3 kg, Temperature 37.3 C, Pulse 74, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 17 a:Dizziness p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed dimenhydrinate - 50 mg every 4-6 hours, and ordered Nystagmus Test.
